Contact a member of our design team for bespoke / made to measure metalwork services

info@bigferro.co.uk
info@bigferro.co.uk

London’s Premier Bespoke Metalwork Services | Big Ferro in the Home Counties

“With over two decades of expertise, Big Ferro is your trusted partner for comprehensive metalwork solutions across commercial, residential, and industrial sectors. From bespoke metal gates and elegant railings to sturdy handrails and sophisticated balustrades, our craftsmanship is evident in every piece. Our offerings don’t just stop at balconies, canopies, and fencing — we bring your designs to life, tailored to any style or dimension. Beyond metal fabrication, Big Ferro proudly offers onsite mobile welding, advanced powder coating, and dedicated metal repair and restoration services.

Explore Our Project Portfolio

View our project portfolio for a range of our intricately designed, hand crafted metalwork services.

COMPLETED PROJECTS

Gates and Railings

Our range of quality metal gates has been specifically designed to improve security and privacy without compromising on visual taste.

Bespoke Metal Gates

Big Ferro specialise in a wide range of Metal Gates and Railings, including but not limited to; Pedestrian Gates, Double Gates, Sliding Gates, Bi-Folding Gates, Side Gates, Automated Gates and More. With a wide range of size and style combinations available, Big Ferro are confident that we have the right solution for your project.

What we do

Bespoke Balconies Made In London

A balcony is an asset to any property which allows for a small outdoor haven to enjoy the sunshine. Our designs are bespoke and intricate, which will create a beautiful exterior to your home.

Made To Measure Balconies

Big Ferro are experts in handcrafted, made to measure balconies. We serve both the commercial and residential sectors, in and around London. If you are looking for style inspiration please click on the link below to see some of the balconies we created in the past.

See the gallery

Staircases, Handrails & Balustrades

The staircase to your home can make a real difference to the look and feel of a room. Whether you opt for a traditional or contemporary design we can help create the right ambiance for you.

Bespoke Metal Services

We are delighted to help design and install the perfect handrails and/or balustrades to accompany your staircase. Our prices are competitive and our styles unique so we can help find something to suit your budget. We specialise in contemporary and traditional designs. Click here to learn more.

Our works

Our Core Values

We place our customers at the heart of our business. We nurture our customers from design & fabrication through to installation and aftercare. We offer a–Year warranty with all of our work.

Honesty

We operate on an Open and Honest basis and pride ourselves on complete transparency.

Commitment

We focus on consistent effort and commitment ensuring excellent customer service.

Teamwork

We have a great team who ensure your project is managed and executed within the correct timescales and to the highest standard.

Ownership

All work(s) are completed in house, meaning we take full accountability and ownership every step of the way.

Get a quote today

Our Clients Say

“We had a made to measure grill made for on top of our gate, very quick to measure make and fit very happy. Thanks!”

Very pleased with the Secure Grill

“This company have some very skilled artisans who are able to make some exquisite gates. They are efficient and well priced and I could not recommend them enough. We are delighted with the gates they made for us.”

Fantastic Gate Company

“We engaged Big Ferro Limited for metal works within our latest development. They proved to be very professional, fast and reliable. I would have no hesitation in recommending them.”

Nice service!!!

“I truly recommend Big Ferro, excellent service, they made my gate in a very short time for a fair price. Don’t hesitate to contact them.”

Better than what I expected
Excellent
Based on 33 reviews
Peter Holland
31. December, 2021.
Absolutely delighted. It as much appreciated that you could arrange for the installation to be completed a day early. Riccardo and his colleague were hardworking,friendly and aproachable,they answered all my questions,and I was most impressed by the logical order in which they carried out the task,the quality of the tools they were using and the level of skill deployed. The resultant handrails are exactly what we had in mind, suit the house well and look great. Many thanks. Best wishes for Cristmas and the New Year, Peter
Catherine Reifen
20. December, 2021.
These guys did a fantastic job. The railings are very high quality and look superb. Francesco was helpful and friendly throughout, as were the installation team. Reasonable prices and quick turnaround without compromising the quality. Highly recommended!
a gurfinkel
26. November, 2021.
Really recommend Big Ferro. The team are helpful, professional & a pleasure to deal with. The handrail Big Ferro created & installed is exactly what we asked for, & has already proven to be very helpful. THANK YOU!
Andrea Puccio
18. October, 2021.
Amazing experience, thank you for my gate, amazing work!
alexy
7. October, 2021.
Big Ferro did an excellent job in designing, removing the old balcony and installing a new garden balcony with stairs… which I’thrilled with. They were very helpful through the whole process in giving advice and choice and very reasonably priced. I am very grateful to the whole team for their professionalism and skill. I would highly recommend Big Ferro to anyone.
Sarah Eleftheriou
7. October, 2021.
I can't begin to recommend Big Ferro highly enough! From the first moment I contacted this incredible company, they provided a level of customer service that was truly above and beyond - such a breath of fresh air! Francesco called me straight away and within hours of my initial query, Riccardo was visiting us to discuss all the options for a new bespoke gate. Once we had agreed on the design, Francesco stayed in contact to let us know how long the process would take and to arrange delivery and fitting. They are very passionate about what they do and that is clear in the beautiful result - we absolutely love our new gate! Thank you again Francesco, Riccardo and team.
Leonardo Silva
26. August, 2021.
Our experience was positive since the first contact with Divya, by understanding our needs and preparing a proposal based on what we were looking for. The technical assistance and the work execution went beyond our expectations. We are so glad to be found, Big Ferro.
zoe hutchins
11. August, 2021.
Big Ferro made some lovely fencing and a gate to my own design, they communicated well throughout and advised on technicalities. Very pleased with the result.
Isabelle Gilks
27. July, 2021.
Impeccable service
June Wyer
11. May, 2021.
Great product, quick and efficient installation, and very pleasant friendly people to deal with. Very happy with my new front railings and gate.

Trusted Partner

We take safety and quality as priority. We’re fully certified and trained fabricators
(CHAS, SSIP, UKATA, Alcumus, Safe Contractor, Code a Weld).

Follow Us!

We nurture our customers from design & fabrication
We nurture our customers from design & fabrication
We nurture our customers from design & fabrication
Competitively priced without compromising on quali
Competitively priced without compromising on quali
Competitively priced without compromising on quali

Our Experience at Your Service

Our mission is to supply authentic and crafted Italian metalworks, curated by international qualified and experienced staff who strive to exceed our valued customers’ expectations.
